author: Aditi Surie
title: Services at our doorstep
description: Similar to health workers, delivery workers are the new front-line force keeping citizens’ lives running
content: The ferrymen of Wuhan, who have been providing groceries, food and medicines to citizens isolated in their homes, have been the backbone of cities that have been most hit by the novel coronavirus. In China, ride-hailing company Didi and others have a dedicate… [+4482 chars]
